CoreOSImageID.Description: Launch Controller and Worker EC2 Instances using this CoreOS AMI

UbuntuImageID.Description: Launch Bastion EC2 Instances using this Ubuntu AMI

GatewayInstanceType.Description: Launch EC2 Instances in the Gateway AutoScaling Group using this Instance type

ControllerInstanceType.Description: Launch EC2 Instances in the Controller AutoScaling Group using this Instance type

WorkerInstanceType.Description: Launch EC2 Instances in the Worker AutoScaling Group using this Instance type

BastionInstanceType.Description: Launch the Bastion EC2 Instance using this Instance type

AvailabilityZone.Description: Deploy all resources into this AvailabilityZone

ClusterName.Description: Name of cluster; resources are tagged with this value

ClusterVPC.Description: ID of VPC into which the Kubernetes cluster is deployed

ClusterInternetGateway.Description: ID of Internet Gateway attached to ClusterVPC

ClusterVPNGateway.Description: ID of VPN gateway available to the ClusterVPC

PeerVPC.Description: ID of VPC made routable to and from the Kubernetes cluster

PeerConnectionID.Description: ID of existing VPC Peering Connection that connects the PeerVPC to the ClusterVPC

PublicSubnetCIDR.Description: Subnet used for the public-facing EC2 entities; must be contained within ClusterNetworkCIDR

ControllerSubnetCIDR.Description: Subnet used for the controller EC2 instances; must be contained within ClusterNetworkCIDR

WorkerSubnetCIDR.Description: Subnet used for the worker EC2 instances; must be contained within ClusterNetworkCIDR

GatewayUserData.Description: Launch Gateway EC2 Instances with this UserData

ControllerUserData.Description: Launch Controller EC2 Instances with this UserData

WorkerUserData.Description: Launch Worker EC2 Instances with this UserData

BastionUserData.Description: Launch Bastion EC2 Instances with this UserData

BastionInstanceRootDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of Bastion EC2 Instance root disk.

ControllerInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 Instances to provision as Controllers.

ControllerInstanceRootDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of Controller EC2 Instance root disk.

GatewayInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 Instances to provision as Gateways.

GatewayInstanceRootDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of Gateway EC2 Instance root disk.

WorkerInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 Instances to provision as Workers

WorkerInstanceRootDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of Worker EC2 Instance root disk.

WorkerInstanceRootDiskIOPs.Description: Number of IOPs to provision for the Worker EC2 Instance root disk.

HostedZone.Description: DNS zone hosted in Route 53 that will be used to provide DNS resolution for the Kubernetes API to external clients

S3ConfigBucket.Description: S3 bucket that hosts the config tarball for this cluster. An object by the name of <ClusterName>.tar.gz must be present in this bucket.
